entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:32 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 06:49 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Heavy Snow
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: SW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers or drizzle late this morning and this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:51 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers or drizzle early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 06:51 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:51 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
